channel.title: Need help bad!
channel.description: my server wont go online when i go to run server in source it says server is already being used and i need to add a torrent to utorrent but i dont know how to

item.title: Need help bad!
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

crimim:

my server wont go online when i go to run server in source it says server is already being used and you donâ€™t need to add a torrent to utorrent!

^ i revised it

Ok to portforward through uTorrent.
1.press ctrl and p
2.select connections
3.set port to 43594
4.press apply then ok
5.do step #1 again
6.instead of using 43594 click randomize port and do #4 again
7.close uTorrent down
8.Go to system tray (<[vista/xp] ^[win 7 users]) then right click on the uTorrent icon and click exit and if a window popsup saying do you want to close click ok.

Read full topic
